roleset.name: stalinize again
roleset.note: RESTALINIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire. (from restalinize.01-v)

example.name: passive, alternate spelling
example.text: The leader of the second largest party in Russia , the communist party , wants [Russia]-1 to be " re-Stalinised " *-1 .
